data.text: @VRWCTexan Among the travesties in this CR is the 15.6 billion for Covid, what, Covid's over, didn't Congress get the memo... that money is a slush fund, it will be "redirected" into some nefarious purpose they couldn't get funded otherwise. You heard it here first.
